A '''brick wall''' is a [[Bricks|brick]] variant of a [[wall]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Brick walls can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.
{{Breaking row|Brick Wall|Pickaxe|Wood|horizontal=1}}

=== Natural generation ===
Brick walls can generate in [[trail ruins]].
